title: S3 Ep2: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 1 – Reenactments

description: July 12, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts today's addendum discussing the first episode of Season 3 of Undisclosed on the Dennis Perry case, as well as the recent ruling in the Joey Watkins case.
